channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road breaking up, 5th February
item.description:
Road outside of Post Office on High Street is breaking up.

item.title: Mattress, 5th February
item.description:
At the junction of Main Road And Chalkpit Avenue next to the electrical boxes there is a flytip of a double mattress please remove.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Sayes Court Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Multiple potholes in road, 5th February
item.description:
More and more potholes appearing just after the exit to the Merton school heading southbound. cars are swerving to avoid them and an accident waiting to happen by hitting oncoming vehicles. Also if a motorcyclist or cyclist hits one of these a fatality waiting to happen
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rectory Lane, North Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter dumped, 5th February
item.description:
This box was dumped here 2 weeks ago. Bins have been collected twice and I don't understand why it wouldn't just be cleared away. It would have been walked past when collecting bins. Dog foul also about 2 meters from this tree too. Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ancaster Street, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Church walk between Howard Road and Newington Green, 5th February
item.description:
At the Newington Green end, there is an increasing amount of dog poo. Lazy people who cannot be bothered to clean up. Lots of children use this lane. This is a continuing problem
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Church Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
